local_intent: Align the tool yaw to 90° after approaching the dishwasher handle and verify orientation.
assumptions: Handle is approximately horizontal so yaw 90° aligns the gripper with the bar.
Robot can reach the handle after moving to the dishwasher front.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan around SetTCPYaw: perceive (visibility/scan), approach and align to handle, set yaw=90, then verify with AtOrientation.
